conclusion: Determine the refractive index of the transparent material for both red and green light.
The laser beam is injected perpendicular to the diameter MN at the center point O of the semicircle.
When the laser beam shifts to the left from the point O, it is found that only monochromatic light is emitted from the semicircle surface.
This indicates that the refractive index of the transparent material for red light is 1.
The laser beam is injected perpendicular to the diameter MN at the center point O of the semicircle.
When the laser beam shifts to the left from the point O, it is found that only monochromatic light is emitted from the semicircle surface.
This indicates that the refractive index of the transparent material for green light is 1.
The refractive index of the transparent material for both red and green light is 1.
